attributes.action: START GRADUATE ROUTE FROM MARCH 2021 FOR BENEFITS OF ALL STUDENTS IN ALL INTAKE.
attributes.additional_details: Government introduced new graduate route in October 2019  which is great opportunity for every international student but as government stated route will introduce in 2021 summer in which student who's visas expire before summer from January 2021 to June 2021 will not get that benefit.So we want everyone should get benefit because its not only about the new graduate route it is also about equal opportunity for each and every student because student pay high fees to study and get experience in uk
attributes.background:
We want government to make new graduate route as soon as possible before summer 2021. As it should get benefit to all students who came uk for studies in July 2019 September 2019 January 2020.
Because every student have same rights for the new graduate route who came UK on same visa status.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend the stay for 2019/2020 International students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553137

Extend Tier 4 Visas for International Students expiring in January 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559530

International Students should be granted 4 year Post Study work visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550652

Provide clarification on the new Graduate Route Visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559430
